title: Yi Toplane - AFK to victory
body: Anybody else been running Master Yi in toplane? There's some ridiculous potential to wreck face with him. I've levelled my mastery with him to max and regularly get 20+ kills in a game with him, he's so great to play with my skillset, as I can time the Q's, flash's and W's to waste opponents CC and then BORK active + ult and chase them through the lane to death.

replies.body:
In solo queues people have the tendency to not act aggressive early game even when they're supposed to playing against certain matchups.

It's like playing Nasus really, a lot of people don't seem to get that his early game is not good, and complain that his late is too strong.
